shipwreck.description: Your ship crashes on the shores of a mysterious island. The crew is scattered, and you are left alone. You see a dense jungle ahead and a rocky path leading up a hill.

jungle.description: The jungle is thick and full of strange noises. You come across an old map nailed to a tree and a rusted compass lying nearby.

ignore_map.text: Ignore the map and keep walking

hilltop.description: From the top of the hill, you see the entire island. There’s a cave to the north and a sparkling lagoon to the south.

treasure_clue.description: The map points to a hidden treasure in the cave. You head there carefully, avoiding traps along the way.

danger.description: Ignoring the map, you wander deeper into the jungle and encounter a wild animal. You don’t survive the attack.

cave.description: Inside the dark cave, you find signs of old pirates and a faint glow deeper inside. You also hear strange noises.

lagoon.description: The lagoon is beautiful, but there’s no sign of treasure. You relax and enjoy the scenery, but your adventure ends here.

treasure.description: You find the legendary treasure chest of Captain Silver! You open it to reveal gold, jewels, and ancient artifacts. You’ve won!

jungle_exit.description: You leave the cave and wander back into the jungle, but you never find your way out.
